features.name: Partner Snore
features.text: Gently raise your partner’s head to help alleviate snoring*

features.name: Lighting
features.text: Find your way at night with under bed lighting

packaged_products.name: p5
packaged_products.long_description: You’ll love plush, cushioned pressure relief with this 4" combination of comfort layers that contour to you.
packaged_products.meta_description: The Sleep Number 360 p5 Smart Bed maximizes pressure relieving comfort while tracking how you're sleeping, adjusting to your personalized sleeping habits.
packaged_products.disclaimer: Furniture sold separately. Prices higher in AK and HI
packaged_products.upsell_text: Standard base sold separately. Options available in shopping cart.

features.name: Dual Adjustability
features.text: Adjusts to your comfort on both sides - your Sleep Number<sup>®</sup> setting.

features.name: Responsive Air<sup>®</sup> technology
features.text: Effortlessly responds and automatically adjusts firmness on each side

features.name: SleepIQ<sup>®</sup> technology
features.text: Tracks how you’re sleeping, so you know how your day affects your night.

features.name: Temperature balancing sleep surface
features.text: Absorbs excess heat and releases it as you cool, so you sleep just right.

financing.disclaimer_message:
No Interest For 48 Months*

On purchases with a Sleep Number® credit card through 12/01/2022. 48 equal monthly payments required.

*Qualifying purchase amount must be on one receipt. No interest will be charged and equal monthly payments are required on promo purchase until it is paid in full. These payments equal the total promo purchase amount divided by the number of months in the promo period and rounded up to the next whole dollar. These payments may be higher than the payments that would be required if this purchase was a non-promo purchase. Any monthly payments shown in connection with this promotional offer exclude taxes and delivery and should allow you to pay off the promotional purchase within the promo period if (1) you make your payments by the due date each month and (2) this is the only balance on your account during the promo period. If you have other balances on your account, this monthly payment will be added to the minimum payment applicable to those balances. Regular account terms apply to non-promo purchases. For new accounts: Purchase APR is 29.99%. Minimum interest charge is $2. Existing cardholders: See your credit card agreement terms. Subject to credit approval.

On purchases with a Sleep Number® credit card through 12/01/2022. 48 equal monthly payments required.

packaged_products.name: Flexfit™ 1 Base
packaged_products.description: Gently raise your partner's side to help prevent snoring.* It's smart adjustability, comfortably priced.
packaged_products.meta_description: The Sleep Number 360 Series bed. The only bed designed to make you smarter, healthier and happier. Starting Around $2,299.
packaged_products.positioning_statement: Take the roar out of snore™
packaged_products.upsell_text: Standard King option shown. FlexTop<sup>®</sup> (individual head control) and Split (individual head control) options available in shopping cart.
